name: Space Junk
overview: A Defender style shoot'em up game also published in Your Computer 1985/03 and 1985/07. Space Junk is a fast, all action, machine-code game for the Commodore 64. It features ultra- smooth movement of all graphics, including the finee scrolling of the planet surface. The basic idea of the game is to move your spaceship across the planet and retrieve 2 satellites which litter the skies. However, it is not very easy as there are four junkies patrolling the planet and touching them is fatal.
